text.en-trans: lha yi lhar gyur chomden jampal yang

text.en: Please clear away the darkness of ignorance entirely from my mind,
text.en-trans: dak lö nying gi münpa rab sal né

text.en: And unlock a hundred doors to courageous eloquence
text.en-trans: sheja kün la tokpa mepa yi

text.en: And unhindered understanding of all that can be known!
text.en-trans: lodrö pobpé go gya jé du sol
om ara pa tsa na dhih
